location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Plan sketching the suggested site for the Squadron Camp at the West end of the Ras El-Hadd (Ras Al Hadd) Peninsula at the entrance to Khor Hajar, opposite the unloading bay. The site is one of the facilities at Ras Al Hadd landing ground at Salalah, Oman.The plan is prepared by G S Cooper, Civil Engineer, Air Headquarters, Iraq as part of a report titled ‘REPORT ON SOUTH ARABIAN COAST- INSPECTION TOUR- SEPTEMBER, 1942.’ The plan itself is marked as Appendix C.
